column4: hmm did a driver update on 9.04 using nvidias installer 185.x and now I get this error: Screen(s) found, but none have a usable configuration.. what should I do.
run sudo nvidia-xconfig in a terminal then reboot see if that fixes it
when you said upgraded what driver did you have before that?
did you uninstall it first before installing the new driver if not you need to uninstall everything and reinstall
